summary: at first i thought it was a really bad decision to draw shigaraki because of all those hands and yes it really tested my...
body:
at first i thought it was a really bad decision to draw shigaraki because of all those hands and yes it really tested my patience and broke my sanity lol good thing it was a good hand drawing day for me

Time: 6 hours, 3 minutes

Resolution: 2048x2372

Program: Sketch Club

Video Editor: Videoshop

Device: iPad Pro

Speedpaint: https://youtu.be/IFUizKIO-54

blog.name: reasonablybloomingatbest
blog.title: A Number of Cold Reptiles
blog.description: i am a queer twenty something graduate student in archaeology i like video games and dead things and there is a very good chance at any point in time i am screaming internally i am screaming internally right now as i procrastiate on my final to write this updated description of myself send help

title: Give Money, Get Fic
body:
Hello all,

So, my finances for the next couple months are looking…. grim. Even more grim if I don’t manage to get a job set up for after I graduate. Rent here is very high and even with loans and my tax returns, I’m sort of fucked. I owe the school money and I’m pretty sure they won’t let me graduate without paying it. I had to borrow money for this month’s rent even. 

Some of this is on me.  I have difficulty with following a budget due to impulsiveness that comes with ADHD; Which I am working very hard on. 

Some of this is medical expenses. Fall of last 2017 I had an emergency root canal, which I was able to get a care credit card to cover but I had to pay off the final 500$ of it in bulk in February and that really hurt. Some of this is car trouble, cause fall of 2017 I had to pay 600$ to fix my car. Both of these incidents fucked my savings. Some of this is from expenses that came along with doing research this summer for my masters.  I have a maxed credit card, that I have used for other various teeth and car related disasters over the years but I finally maxed it out and now my credit card payment is a huge burden. 

You can just donate, but, I don’t want to just ask for donations. My only real marketable skill is writing. So, I guess I’m taking fic commissions? I’m starting at 5$ per 1k words, bumping up to 10$ per 1k over 3k. Here is my AO3 account for examples of my writing.

I’m willing to write OC/Canon character, introspective character pieces, angst, AUs, funny pieces. Most of my examples are from Dishonored but I’m willing to write for a lot of fandoms: Fire Emblem, Dragon Age, Dishonored, Boku No Hero Acadamia, Umbrella Academy, if you’re curious if I can write it just ask me I guess?  I’ll do some more racy stuff but probably not nsfw. 

Paypal Link Here

I would also like to offer up my services for transcribing audio files into text. Its a skill I have from several years of captioning phone calls for the hard of hearing, and from transcribing interviews for research.  Its a bit more niche, and we can discuss prices, but yo I can and will.

blog.description: bnha x reader// voltron KACXA CONTENT ONLY SRYNOTSRY// mlb// some other shit too i guess// REQUESTS ARE ALWAYS OPEN!!

summary: Hi! May i request a scenario where bakubo’s s/o wants to touch his muscles because hes a t h i c c boi thank you wow im really...
question: Hi! May i request a scenario where bakubo’s s/o wants to touch his muscles because hes a t h i c c boi thank you wow im really thirsty for this u amaze bro
answer:
AWWWW U TOO KIND U SILLY GOOSE ☺️☺️ here u go hope u like it


————————————

Bakugo’s girlfriend watched in awe as he continued to do his push ups on his floor, she sat with her legs crossed on his bed, amazed by his fit body.

He must’ve done around 100, she stopped counting once he reached 80. Not stopping until he felt like it was enough for him. She knew he was fit but she didn’t know he was THIS fit.

His biceps tensed every time he lowered himself. God how she wished she was underneath him. Her eyes started darting around his body, examining all of his muscles. Holy shit was he ripped. Thanks to his tight vest, she could finally see his form better.

He finished his push ups, his breathing was loud and heavy, sweat dripping down his forehead as he pushed himself up from the floor. S/o couldn’t look away from such beauty, she hadn’t realised that her mouth had been open the entire time as she watched her boyfriend.

He threw himself on the bed next to her, whispering a curse to himself as his entire body was in pain.

“The fuck are you looking at?” He asked, he noticed how much she was staring at him, he wasn’t an idiot.

“Nothin” She refocused herself onto him and was no longer paying attention to his body. She then had a strange idea come into her head. He may not like it, but she didn’t care, she was genuinely fascinated.

She crawled her way over to him, sitting on his lap. Bakugo’s head snapped to her, eyebrows raised in confusion. “What the fuck are you doing?” His tone was harsh but she was used to it.

“Shut up and leave me be.” Her tone was also harsh.

Her hands began to trail up his arm, grippping them whenever she felt like it, she was amazed by his fit body and how perfect he looked.

“Fucking hell Katsuki” She whispered under her breath, mainly thinking out loud.

“Yeah I’m pretty impressed myself.” He teased, acting cocky like he usually does.

“Yeah yeah you’re fucking ripped babe I get it.” S/o spat back at him, taking a shot at his cockiness which resulted in him kissing his teeth.

Bakugo sighed, allowing his girlfriend to do whatever it was that she was doing until she grabbed a certain part on his arm that was sore, making him hiss out in pain. “Shit!” He cursed.

S/o took advantage of this and began applying pressure to that area, fully aware of how much it hurt him. A playful grin on her face, “awww what’s the matter babe? Did you hurt yourself?” She said teasingly.

“YES THAT HURTS! FUCKING STOP!” He yelled back at her, he always hated whenever she teased him because when she did, she made sure he would be dragged through LAVA.

S/o stopped messing with her boyfriend, throwing herself onto the space next to him on the bed, laughing to herself. “Someone’s a lil sensitive don’t you think?” She sighed.

Bakugo grinned teasingly, giving her the same look that she gave him. He placed himself on top of her, straddling her lips with his body and bringing one of her hands to pin her arms above her head.

He slowly leaned down to her ear whispering softly. “Someone’s about to feel realllll sensitive all over in a second.”

S/o gulped, immediately regretting what she had just done.


REQUESTS ARE ALWAYS OPEN!!

summary: honenuki: i love class 1-A. i’m in their common room waiting for a friend and there’s kirishima on the couch w a bunch of his...
body: honenuki: i love class 1-A. i’m in their common room waiting for a friend and there’s kirishima on the couch w a bunch of his friends around him and i can only hear bits and pieces but someone asked him “who gets the minecraft server if you guys break up?” and he started crying harder and sero reached over to smack the guy who asked it on the back of the head

dialogue.name: honenuki
dialogue.label: honenuki:
dialogue.phrase: i love class 1-A. i’m in their common room waiting for a friend and there’s kirishima on the couch w a bunch of his friends around him and i can only hear bits and pieces but someone asked him “who gets the minecraft server if you guys break up?” and he started crying harder and sero reached over to smack the guy who asked it on the back of the head

16|female|INFP|†

Music Tag: amateur tunes
 I am living trash that doesn't really have that much to say sometimes

Present Mic while Driving: I hate every single person on this...
body:
Present Mic at Home: Why isn't there more kindness in the world?
Present Mic while Driving: I hate every single person on this planet.

tags: it's a really good mental exercise to create their quirks
summary: Boku no Hero Academia Class 1-A + Aizawa and Mic Fusions (Part 1)
body:
Boku no Hero Academia Class 1-A + Aizawa and Mic Fusions (Part 1)

1. Aoyama & Tsuyu

Tsuga-they/them pronouns

Status: Stable

Personality: -Accidentally condescending

-Blunt

-Somehow subtly dramatic

Quirk: Frog attributes + Can shoot a laser from their mouth, but if used for longer than a couple seconds it can give them a sore throat.

2. Aoyama & Midoriya

Izuga-He/Him pronouns

Status: Semi-Stable

Personality: -Dramatic around friends, but shy around others.

-BEAUTIFUL AND HE KNOWS IT

-Can’t flirt to save his life

-Mumbles in French

Quirk: Strong laser. Can punch through things like iron with it. Has the same weakness as normal laser. Nausea.

3. Aoyama & Iida

Yunya-He/Him pronouns

Status: Stable

Personality: -Literally sparkles wherever he goes

-Very kind

-Pretty boi

-Strict in appropriate situations and a free spirit in others

Quirk: Light speed engines, but can only go for bursts of three seconds at max. Recipro Burst leaves him on the verge of vomiting if used more than once(usually leads to vomit if overdone).

4. Aoyama & Uraraka

Yuchako-They/Them

Status: Semi-Stable

Personality: -Glitter and rainbows

-Fashionista

-Tea connoisseur

-Swaps to French without realizing it, not noticing until someone gives them the face

Quirk: Can control own laser. Can make it turn with their will. Nausea if overdone.

5. Aoyama & Todoroki

Shoga-He/Him

Status: Barely Stable

Personality: -Cold to other people’s feelings without realizing it.

-Tea junkie

-FABULOUS

Quirk: Heat/Freeze ray. After long durations, his stomach gets hot/cold and going longer than his limit gives him burns/mild frostbite.

6. Aoyama & Bakugo

Katsuga-He/Him

Status: Unstable

Personality: -THE BIGGEST condescending asshole

-Sparkles when angry

-WILL cuss you out in French every chance he gets

Quirk: Explosive laser. If he uses it too much, he can get heat stroke and burns.

7. Aoyama & Jiro

Yuoka-They don’t care.

Status: Stable

Personality: -Loves French music at MAX vol.

-French junk food is their guilty pleasure.

-Not afraid to flip someone off if they get mad

Quirk: Laser shooting earphone jacks. Standing too close to the blasts will make their heartbeat, that comes with the laser, deafeningly audible.

8. Aoyama & Hagakure

Yuru-They/Them

Status: Stable

Personality: -transparent(hah) feelings

-Dramatically feigns hurt feelings

-Smiley 24/7 & has sparkly teeth

Quirk: invisible laser + their chest is invisible. Laser still has the nausea drawback.

9. Aoyama & Mineta

Yuneta-He/Him

Status: Stable

Personality: -100% Pervert

-Incorrigible flirt

-French innuendos everywhere

Quirk: Laser hair. Get headaches after prolonged use.

10. Aoyama & Tokoyami

Yukage-He/Him

Status: Unstable

Personality: -Conflicted

-Can’t decide whether to be in the light or dark

-Hates how confused he is all the time

-Dark humor generator

Quirk: Shadow laser + ‘Light Shadow’(Pretty much Dark Shadow made of glittery light) Can’t use either in their respected light/dark very long before losing control

summary: PURRS ULTRA! is opening pre-orders for the Cat Cafe Zine soon! If you’re a BNHA fan and like cats, this zine is a MUST for you!!...
caption:
PURRS ULTRA! is opening pre-orders for the Cat Cafe Zine soon!

If you’re a BNHA fan and like cats, this zine is a MUST for you!! And the best part is that all profits will be donated to an animal charity!

Here you have a lil preview of my piece, which features 6 characters (not counting the kitties). Expect a whole lot of amazing, adorable and warm pieces, and a bunch of beautifully written, fluffy stories!

https://bnhacatcafe.tumblr.com/

summary:
ojiro: kaminari texted me "your adorable" so i texted him back and said 'no, YOU'RE adorable'
hagakure: and? 
ojiro: and now...
body:
ojiro: kaminari texted me “your adorable” so i texted him back and said ‘no, YOU’RE adorable’

hagakure: and?

ojiro: and now we’re dating ig. we’ve been on like,.,., five dates. all i did was point out a typo but i like him so im not gonna say anything

reblog.comment:

summary: and another ask todoroki thing! that was a real pleasure to draw fuyumi, I fell in love with her while collecting caps, she is...
caption:
and another ask todoroki thing!

that was a real pleasure to draw fuyumi, I fell in love with her while collecting caps, she is my godess now

also, todoroki siblings only allowed to wear shades of blue, didn’t you know?
also, natsuo, wait for your food, like a normal person

reblog.comment:
and another ask todoroki thing!

that was a real pleasure to draw fuyumi, I fell in love with her while collecting caps, she is my godess now

also, todoroki siblings only allowed to wear shades of blue, didn’t you know?
also, natsuo, wait for your food, like a normal person

trail.content_raw:
and another ask todoroki thing!

that was a real pleasure to draw fuyumi, I fell in love with her while collecting caps, she is my godess now

also, todoroki siblings only allowed to wear shades of blue, didn’t you know?
also, natsuo, wait for your food, like a normal person
trail.content:
and another ask todoroki thing!

also, todoroki siblings only allowed to wear shades of blue, didn’t you know?
also, natsuo, wait for your food, like a normal person
